articles.description: SPECIAL REPORT: Companies such as Carling and Pulman Volkswagen have been labelled hypocritical for claiming to support diversity, yet following a club run by Saudi Arabia.
articles.content:
Newcastle United's sponsors have been accused of 'turning a blind eye to homophobia' with their silence over the club's Saudi-led takeover.
Gay and lesbian campaign groups have branded companies suc… [+6115 chars]
